title: Biden formally approves new US troops to Europe amid Russia threat, deployments expected in 'coming days' - CNN
content:
1. Biden formally approves new US troops to Europe amid Russia threat, deployments expected in 'coming days'  CNN
  2. Russia-Ukraine: US sending 3,000 more troops to NATO's eastern flank, officials say: LIVE UPDATES  Fox News
  3. Ukraine Live Updates: U.S. Troops to Be Deployed to NATO Allies in Eastern Europe  The New York Times
  4. U.S. Orders 3,000 Troops to Bolster European Allies in Russia-Ukraine Crisis  The Wall Street Journal
  5. U.S. to move 3,000 troops closer to Ukraine as Russia crisis escalates  CNBC
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: President Joe Biden has formally approved additional US military deployments to Eastern Europe, the Pentagon announced Wednesday, with US troops deploying soon to Poland, Germany and Romania.
